entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
